lib

Class DES

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.DES

  • public class DES
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for decryption and encryption.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DES()
      Constructor Sets cipher to an DES cipher
